title: Asa No Tsuukin Densha De, Yatara To Hanashikakete Kuru Joshikousei.
alternative_title: Una chica de preparatoria que me habla mucho en el tren de la mañana camino al trabajo ; 朝の通勤電車で、やたらと話しかけてくる女子高生。 ; The High School Girl Who Randomly Talks to Me on the Morning Commuter Train.
status: Una chica de preparatoria que me habla mucho en el tren de la mañana camino al trabajo ; 朝の通勤電車で、やたらと話しかけてくる女子高生。 ; The High School Girl Who Randomly Talks to Me on the Morning Commuter Train.
description:
Description :
        I hate going to the office in the morning, and having to commute on a crowded train makes it even worse! What if you could relieve the morning blues, even if only a little? This is an encounter with a sunny gal, for all the working stiffs who feel like they are stuck on their morning commute!
